entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing this morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
